item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ChatGPT Pro (322 points | 539 comments)
2. OpenAI o1 system card (279 points | 161 comments)
3. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (193 points | 53 comments)
4. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (22 points | 8 comments)
5. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (102 points | 12 comments)
6. Accidentally writing a fast SAT solver (30 points | 7 comments)
7. Show HN: Banan-OS, an Unix-like operating system written from scratch (110 points | 17 comments)
8. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Dev Advocate ( | hide)
9. I spent a year building an Android course for the elderly (35 points | 12 comments)
10. AmpereOne: Cores Are the New MHz (65 points | 38 comments)
11. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (20 points | 6 comments)
12. An Interview with Bill Watterson (1987) (92 points | 57 comments)
13. McKinsey unit will pay $123M to settle claims it bribed South African officials (64 points | 27 comments)
14. Memory is all we have (20 points | 4 comments)
15. Haunted by My Own Projects (38 points | 17 comments)
16. React 19 (138 points | 129 comments)
17. Congo gov. says it's 'on alert' over mystery flu-like disease that killed dozens (81 points | 25 comments)
18. A transport protocol's view of Starlink (6 points | 1 comment)
19. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (448 points | 108 comments)
20. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (141 points | 34 comments)
21. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (62 points | 47 comments)
22. Tsunami Warning for Northern California (253 points | 147 comments)
23. Chocolate intake and risk of type 2 diabetes: prospective cohort studies (47 points | 48 comments)
24. Exploring inference memory saturation effect: H100 vs. MI300x (44 points | 7 comments)
25. cli53 – Command line tool for Amazon Route 53 (43 points | 5 comments)
26. Keyset cursors, not offsets, for Postgres pagination (12 points | 1 comment)
27. Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model (1184 points | 393 comments)
28. Training myself to run farther with Strava's API and an IoT dog feeder of M&Ms (106 points | 44 comments)
29. FreeBSD OCI Container on Jails/Bhyve with Support for Podman (44 points | 8 comments)
30. Atmospheric analysis shows Venus never had Earth-like life, scientists say (33 points | 14 comments)
